desc: Armadillo Pro Shield is a ceramic coating developed using the latest ceramic sealer technology. Patent Pending Professional Marine Ceramic Coating Applied In Minutes! No more wax. Armadillo Pro Shield protects paint, gel coat, stainless, plastic and rubber surfaces. Creates a layer of "JUST WAXED" SHINE for weeks!

layout.text: CERAMIC COATING FOR THE ULTIMATE GLOSS & SHINE
Wax No More!™ Armadillo Pro Shield ceramic marine sealer provides lasting protection in minutes. NO rubbing, NO wiping, NO waiting, NO buffing!
